text: <@U02F9CXTL> and <@U026103R3>: I added a super quick shade implementation (without animating the time) and it seems rather odd. So far, we’ve had none of the memory issues I was concerned about, so maybe we should revisit the option of just fading through images as they’re passed on the scrubber?
oh interesting, i'd love to see it
<@U0261PCRQ>: Would love to see it too! Your quick!
lmk when you’re around, I’ll show you what the two look like
it sounds like everyone is onboard for losing the shade. turns out we don’t need that onTimelineStoppedScrubbing callback <@U026PHQ3J>
yes, i just lol'ed at myself
